title: Six friends, A, B, C, D, E & F are sitting on a bench facing in the same direction. C is sitting between A & E, D is not at the end, B is sitting to the immediate right of E, F is not at the right end. Who is to the immediate right of F? - Quora

response.answer_text: Given that ACEB are sitting together. Since D can't be at the ends and F is not at the right end then only B can be at the right end. Therefore putting in the table we get FDACEB. Answer is D
It is obviously D. As you said 1st condition-A C E 2nd condition-A C E B D is not at the end So F will be at left end. It will be arranged like this F D A C E B
